useCase.name: Telephone Conversation
useCase.description: Use case for a telephone conversation between Apelant and Correspondant.

mainSequence.step: Apelant inserts coins into phone booth
If the number is not dialed, Apelant is prompted to hang up
If the number is dialed, the call is connected to Correspondant
In case the line is busy, Apelant hangs up
If the line is free, Correspondant picks up the phone
Money is deducted from the phone booth during conversation
Apelant adds coins during the call
Money is refunded back to Apelant
